title: Initial project structure
summary: Created initial project layout and core files.

title: Launched blog section
summary: Added initial blog scaffolding and content structure.

title: Add Coolify local run steps
summary: Documented how to run the website locally using Coolify.

title: README overhaul and monorepo layout
summary: Rewrote README with monorepo layout, setup guidance, and best practices.

title: Switch to Google Fonts for Outfit
summary: Temporarily moved to Google Fonts for Outfit with corrected crossorigin usage (later replaced by self‑hosting).

title: Licensing overhaul (AGPL + CC BY 4.0)
summary: Adopted AGPL-3.0-or-later for software and CC BY 4.0 for posts/images/docs/data; added NOTICE, LICENSES.md, and per-file SPDX headers.

title: Show Source & License in UI/API
summary: Advertise source and license via UI header and API Link headers to comply with AGPL §13.

title: Docs: Coolify‑first deployment
summary: Simplified README to focus on Docker/Coolify as the best‑supported deployment path; removed other paths.

title: Updates page + navigation
summary: Added a new Updates page that renders /data/updates.json and a header nav link so changes are easy to follow.

title: Self‑host fonts + network optimizations
summary: Reduced third‑party requests and improved reliability by self‑hosting fonts and optimizing asset loading.

title: Popup image fallback
summary: Ensure placeholder shows when images are missing or fail to load.

title: Chromium scrollbar polish
summary: Dark, thin scrollbars for popups and lists on Chrome/Edge; Firefox kept tidy.

title: Prevent wrap of 'More' pills
summary: Stops the header's 'More' pills from wrapping onto multiple lines by enforcing white-space: nowrap on pill items. This keeps the navigation tidy and improves readability on smaller screens.

title: Center header and filter styling
summary: Center the Updates page heading/lead and style the filter UI to match the Limits page (centered layout at 720px). This improves readability on smaller screens and provides a consistent look across data-driven pages.

title: Keep search icon inside input
summary: Keeps the magnifier icon inside the search field and adds a wrapper with max-width and extra right padding. This improves alignment and touch targets on smaller screens.

title: Keep decorative glow disabled in High Contrast
summary: Disables decorative glow in Windows High Contrast mode to maintain a clean, readable UI.

title: Center glow strengthened across pages
summary: Center the glow effect and increase its strength by about 20% across all pages. This enhances visual emphasis and consistency of the Wave-Finder branding, improving perceived depth and polish for users.

title: Global glow wired across pages
summary: Introduced a single, global background glow stylesheet at /static/wf-glow.css and wired the glow effect uniformly across all pages for consistent visuals. This ensures visual cohesion and reduces divergence as new sections are added.

title: Markdown parsing upgraded to marked.js
summary: Replaced the in-house markdown parser with marked.js v11.1.1 (MIT licensed). The library is now hosted locally under /static/ to remove external dependencies. Markdown support is now complete: tables, strikethrough, nested lists, and code blocks render correctly. Updated the LICENSE attribution for marked.js to reflect the new dependency.
